mapper.insert: INSERT INTO thing (name, description, rate, number_of_votes, created_time, updated_time, created_by, updated_by) VALUES (#{thing.name}, #{thing.description}, #{thing.rate}, #{thing.numberOfVotes}, #{thing.createdTime}, #{thing.updatedTime}, #{thing.createdBy}, #{thing.updatedBy})
mapper.update: UPDATE thing set rate=rate+#{rate}, number_of_votes=number_of_votes+1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT rate FROM thing WHERE id=#{id}

SELECT id, name, description, rate, number_of_votes numberOfVotes, created_time createdTime, updated_time updatedTime, created_by createdBy, updated_by updatedBy FROM thing WHERE description like #{phrase} or name like #{phrase}

SELECT id, name, description, rate, number_of_votes numberOfVotes, created_time createdTime, updated_time updatedTime, created_by createdBy, updated_by updatedBy FROM thing WHERE created_by = #{createdBy}
